## Pipeline.removePipe() method

Removes a pipe from the pipeline based on its ID.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removePipe(id: string): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The ID of the pipe to be removed. |

**Returns:**

this

The updated pipeline instance.
